text.p: These are the leading stories in the Skopje press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does vouch for their accuracy.
- Macedonia and Poland signed three economic cooperation agreeements. Polish foreign minster Dariusz Rosati to meet Macedonian President Kiro Gligorov and Prime Minister Branko Crvenkovski today.
- Macedonia officially free of hoof-and-mouth disease. EU embargo on exports of Macedonian lamb remain in force.
- Delegation of German businessmen visits Macedonian chamber of commerce. The value of the Macedonian-German trade last year stood at $437 million.
- Macedonians to elect mayors of 81 municipalities out of 124 on Sunday. -- Mircela Casule, Skopje newsroom +389 91 201196
